original_text: How he met thee by the way, and smote the hindmost of thee, even all that were feeble behind thee, when thou wast faint and weary; and he feared not God.
korean_text: 곧 그들이 너를 길에서 만나 네가 피곤할 때에 네 뒤에 떨어진 약한 자들을 쳤고 하나님을 두려워하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: How he met thee by the way
and smote the hindmost of thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 뒤에 있는 자들을 쳤으며

sentences.original_text: even all that were feeble behind thee
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 너의 뒤에 있는 모든 연약한 자들도

sentences.original_text: when thou wast faint and weary
